pageContent: Objective: Online prostate cancer communities (OPCaCs) have emerged as a new source of support, not bounded by geographic barriers, for men living with prostate cancer. This scoping review mapped the existing literature to explore the characteristics and benefits of OPCaCs, identify knowledge gaps, and direct future research.

metaData.source:
Use of cyproterone acetate in animal and clinical trials
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/4949823/
